Entries.DialogueText: Uhh... well, I appreciate the thought.
Oh, really? I wasn't expecting this. It looks great, though. Thank you.
0.8Mmm... once you get used to eating raw fish, it becomes really addictive.
You brought me soup? That's really nice of you.
This one brings back a lot of memories...
0.8Hmm... I wonder, if I put this under my pillow, will it hatch? Hehe... only one way to find out.
Is that obsidian? This is exactly what I've been looking for... I'm gonna see if I can shape it into a dagger.
What are you trying to say... I need to work out?
Well, I'm more of a 'nimble' guy... Maybe I'll read the first half.
Hey, thank you. I'll drink this when the sky gets dark.
Hey, that's a frog egg! I'll see if I can get it to hatch. Thanks!
... alright...
I guess I'll see you around, then...
Don't make fun of me... but I've never been in a relationship like this before.
Don't make fun of me... but I've never really had a girlfriend before.
Hey... you look great.
I've been thinking about you all day...
Hey... It's been a year since we started dating, remember?
It's been the best year of my life...
Why do you keep bothering me? I'm trying to forget about you.
I don't want to see you for a while.
Not so fast! I want to know what it is.
Really? It was making a lot of noise!
It's too dangerous without a sword. But I like your sense of adventure.
Hmm... Not exactly how I'd put it but, yeah.
Yea... That's exactly how I feel, too.
Oh... Well maybe this wasn't the right place to bring you, then. I thought you'd see the beauty in it.
Ugh... You sound like my Mom.
...*sigh*
You're right, though. I'm addicted to these things, it's not good.
Okay, that'll work.
Good choice. That works well with my role.
Great.
Okay... Never mind then.
Don't worry, I'll make sure to show you the ropes before I let you do anything dangerous.
There's no need to worry... I'll make sure you're safe.
The show went well. I was kind of nervous beforehand, but once we went up on stage I just kinda got into the zone.
Are you looking forward to the Spirit's Eve festival? It's probably my favorite.
The Spirit's Eve festival is tomorrow. I really hope they have those skeletons on display again this year.
I almost feel like they're my friends at this point.
*yawn*... I was up until 3 reading this new book...Do you read, ?Yep. The classics.Only Sci-fi and FantasyI like a good RomanceNo, I don't read books
Huh. Sounds boring.
Hey, me too. There's nothing like a good fiction to push the boundaries of the imagination.
62#You probably wouldn't like it.|I think you'd like it.
I've been reading a book about a farmer. Reminds me a lot of you, actually.
Sorry if that creeps you out.
So... it's the big harvest season, isn't it?
You're probably making a lot of money on your farm, huh?
I guess I should get a job soon...
I was *this* close to moping in bed the entire day. Kinda wish I had, now.
The sun is coming out less and less these days... wonderful.
My room might be a little less depressing if I had a window...
Pumpkin spice this... pumpkin spice that... man, I do get sick of these seasonal fads.
I've always felt like an underdog. But the challenge will just make me stronger.
Who does Demetrius think he is, telling me what to do? He's not even my real father.
*yawn*... what time is it? I think I slept too much last night.
I'm glad you showed up. I was starting to get bored.
Now I feel a lot more energetic, believe it or not.
I'm glad the path to the railroad tracks is open again.
I like going up there when I feel like being alone.
...Which is often.
Oh yeah? ... Alright, I will.
Heh... maybe this festival isn't so bad.
Ugh... do we have to? Alright.
No... There's someone else I want to dance with.
Uh... I don't really know you.
Oh yea? Hmm... Not really my thing, but everyone's different I guess.
Oh yeah? Well, did you read the new 'Cave Saga X'? I won't spoil it for you, but oh man...
16#Hey, if you're bored feel free to hang out in my room...|You probably prefer the small-town life, huh?
*sigh*... If gas wasn't so expensive I'd ride my motorcycle to the city today.
So what do you do when you aren't working?More FarmingComic booksSports
What's new?
I'll be at the saloon tonight destroying Sam at pool again.
My mom's freaking out, but I'm actually kind of enjoying this. I bet the frogs are going wild out there!
I'm gonna stay here to try and keep her calm, though.
I was hoping this weather would come back. It makes me appreciate the summer a little more.
Oh. You just moved in, right? Cool.
Out of all the places you could live, you chose Pelican Town?
Demetrius has been all wound up because of the wedding, it's been pretty tense around the house.
Um... need something?
If I just disappeared would it really matter?
I come here for the peace and quiet.
The beach is nice, but I don't love the crowds.
I usually wear black, but in this heat...
I liked the boat ride. At one point you couldn't see any land at all..
I'm ready to get back home.
You think Willy would let me lug a jet ski out here?
...Nah.
It's good to get away from the computer and see the real world sometimes. I forget how nice it can be.
...Now, if I were a tropical frog, where would I hide...
I bet this place looks pretty cool in the rain.
What? I didn't hear you... I'm busy thinking about something.
What do you want?
You know, I should be doing something productive right now. I just lose focus too fast...
Maybe I should drink more coffee?
Hey...
I'm not too big on festivals. Lots of commotion, too much social interaction... More stress than fun, if you ask me.
Ugh... Tomorrow is the worst festival of the year by a mile. Just wait and see how stupid I look during the flower dance.
Hehe... It might be funny to put something disgusting in the potluck soup tomorrow. Just don't poison anyone.
Why ruin the potluck? Hmm... I guess some people feel liberated when the rigid structures of society break down a little. Maybe I'm weird.
Tomorrow we'll all be gathering at the docks to see the migration of the moonlight jellies. I think it starts at ten o'clock.
Oh, hey. *yawn*... sorry.
Hey, I'm glad you stopped by.
How have you been coping with this heat?
Everyone is so happy in the sun. I don't get it.
Everyone is so happy when it's sunny out...
Different people like different things, I guess.||Most people like the sun, huh?
I guess you do need a minimum amount of vitamin D...
The temperature only starts to get comfortable at night.
It always seems to stay a little cooler by the lake.
I hope we're not having mushroom casserole tonight...||Oh no, is it cave carrot tacos night? ...*groan*
I usually only go outside after dark. Does that sound weird to you?
Last night, I saw a group of bats flying around near the lake.
I guess maybe they are feeding on the mosquitoes this time of year?
I definitely don't want to go swimming, if that's what you're going to ask.
Oh, you just stopped to say hi? Sorry.
If you ever wanted to go swimming... I guess I'd do it.
I'm looking forward to the cold, damp season. I feel more at home.
I'm looking forward to the cold, damp season. Channeling my inner toad, I guess.
What's the point of going outside? I've already seen it all.
Why am I grinning? I guess I've been unusually happy lately...
If you're depressed, everything seems stupid. But if you're feeling positive, then even the most mundane things will make you happy.
How do you stay positive long term? I have no idea.
...Maybe I'll figure it out some day.
Hey. Your name is , right?
I was just thinking about you...
Having a good weekend? ...nice.
I usually stay inside, but I do go to the beach now and then.
Pretty much only when it's raining, though.
For some reason, staring off into the bleak horizon makes me feel... I dunno. Like it's worthwhile to keep pushing on, I guess.
I snuck into the caves last night and got a nasty cut from a rock crab. Don't tell anyone, okay?
Hi.
...want something?
Why does everyone like Maru so much? Sure, she's smart and friendly, but don't they realize it's all just an attention-grabbing scam?
Sorry...
Could you picture someone like me living on a farm? It seems ridiculous.
Hey... How are things going on the farm?
Same old routine, huh? Yeah, I know a thing or two about that...|Could you picture me living on a farm?
It seems ridiculous, but I have been thinking about it lately.
I was thinking... people are like stones skipping over the water.
Eventually we're going to sink.
Sam's really outgoing, so when we hang out he does most of the talking.
That's fine with me!||Imagine if Sam was as reserved as I am... we'd hang out and never say a word.||Some people are talkers, others are listeners. I'm more of a listener.
What am I going to do today?
Probably nothing.
I dunno where I'd be without you... probably in a ditch somewhere.
Sam is probably my only friend in this town.
Well, Abby is nice too, but...
Umm.. never mind.
Sam is probably my only friend in this town, anymore...
You and Sam are probably my only friends in this town.
It's the eve of the winter star today. Better make sure you've got an empty stomach for the feast tomorrow.
It's fun to live so close to the train tracks. It's a reminder that there's a big world out there.
When I was younger I'd run out to the railroad whenever I heard a train coming.
Whatever happened to those days...? *sigh*
I'm enjoying this gloomy weather... although I have to say, it's a little cold.
Nothing surprises me anymore... nothing makes me laugh.
Yeah, I know... I'm being a little dramatic.
Do you ever think back on your old self with shame and embarrassment?
I guess it's just part of growing up.
The frogs aren't very happy in winter.
Poor little guys.||I wonder what the frogs do in winter? Do they just become frozen and then thaw out in spring?
I like winter but I do feel bad for all the cold animals out there.
I guess they're used to it, though... like me.
I built a snowgoon but Demetrius made me get rid of it.
What's his problem?
I built a snowgoon but Demetrius made me get rid of it... yet Maru's cute little snowman goes unharmed!
Ridiculous.
I wonder what's for dinner tonight... *grumble*
I should learn how to cook. That would be useful.
Hmm... I don't really have anything to say. I still don't know you very well.
You came here to see me?
It's hard to think of new things to talk about, sometimes. Even after you know someone.
...Sorry.
I was so close to screaming at Mom for throwing away my old comic collection... But something stopped me.
Hmm... with age comes wisdom.
seems lost in thought...
Hey, don't let me stop you from getting your work done.
If you aren't busy I don't mind if you stick around.
In a couple days I'm going to be living on a farm. I can't believe it.
I'm happy, though.
When you showed up in town, I never thought I'd be marrying you some day.
Life is strange, huh?
Hey. I'm surprised to find you out here in the rain.
Look at those dark clouds looming over the horizon...
I hope they come this way.
I like this weather because it makes everyone disappear... you know?
Being around people makes me feel anxious.
I don't feel that way around you, though.
We're getting soaked...
Here... There's room for two.
Our little friend's doing much better, see?
...but I don't think he can go back into the wild... he's not fast enough to avoid predators anymore.
...So I set up this terrarium.
He looks happy, doesn't he?
I wonder if he'll get lonely, though...
Today our family grew a little larger...
...and a lot slimier!
He does look pretty tough. But still, If I find another injured frog, I think he'd be better off with a friend.
Hmm... Well, I like going out in the rain. So I guess I encountered a lot of frogs that way.
I ended up feeling a common bond with the little guys.
Well it's not up for debate. This is my corner of the house and I can do what I want with it.
Yeah, it'll be fun. I spend a lot of time on the computer, so it's nice to have some real, physical hobbies.
I might even try my hand at some frog breeding!
Hey . I was just about to head out.
Hop on...I wanna show you something.
That's Zuzu City in the distance...
I come here when I want to get away from everything and just... think.
-1 null -1 0 event_city1 -1 10 event_city2 -1 -10 event_city3 -1 0 event_city4#You should quit smoking.
The city used to draw me in... but now I'm finding myself happier at home in the valley.
Um... I've never... felt anything like this with another guy before... But you're different.
I don't usually bring girls to this place... In fact, you're the only one.
You know what I'm trying to say, don't you?
Oh, hello .
What, you haven't seen my motorcycle before? Hmmm... I guess I haven't shown it to you.
Sometimes, after sundown, I make the long ride out of Stardew Valley...
There's nothing else like it, blazing along the empty stretch of road toward the faint city glow...
Once I've saved up enough money, I'm going to head out on my own... to the city and beyond. Just me and my bike.
There we go, oil's changed.
-1 null -1 10 event_garage1 -1 -10 event_garage2 -1 0 event_garage3#I'm scared of motorcycles.
Hey ... Glad you showed up.
There's an injured frog in that bush... I gotta save him!
I need your help. Go over to the bush and try to get him to come towards me. I'll wait over here and catch him.
Okay... you ready?
Poor little guy... his foot's all mangled.
Let's take him home.
Now!
Got him!
I'm gonna take him home for now, and make him comfortable.
I guess I'll do some research on how to take care of frogs. Maybe Marnie knows something.
Hah... Yeah, I guess so.
He's definitely got your nose...
Well, sorry if I don't take your word for it... I'm gonna give the poor guy a chance.
We'll do our best. But don't get too attached just yet...

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/k 195099
Entries.DialogueText: Well? What do you have to say for yourself?

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/k 195099_implied
Entries.DialogueText: Guys, calm down! I can explain...
Absolutely.
You need to take responsibility for what you've done...
...Okay.
Yea
Hey, .
Sam and I were about to play 'Solarion Chronicles: The Game'... Why don't you join us? It's better with three players anyway.
Okay, here we go... Let me draw the scenario card.
Hmm... It looks like today's quest will take us into the Necromancer's Tower... to try and reclaim the Solarion Staff from the clutches of Dreadlord Xarth.
Hey! That's what I was going to pick!
I guess I'll be the healer then.
Oh, hey. Gimme one sec.
Where are you going?
Sorry... I had to finish this line before I lost my train of thought.
Stay put.
Decorations?... Oh, yeah... thanks. I've been sticking posters on the wall for years, I guess it's kinda cluttered.
Okay. Sorry about that, I just needed to finish what I was working on.
Hey, not bad!
It took me like, three or four tries to beat my first scenario.
Thanks for stopping by... I'll see you later.
That was an instant message from Sam... I guess he wants to hang out...
Ugh, I don't really feel like going out today.
Did you tell her I'm working?
*sigh*... No one takes my job seriously.
No one ever bothers Maru when she's working at the clinic... does everyone think I'm just surfing the web all day?
Well, I'm trying to save up so I can move out of here. Probably to the city or something.
You know, if I'd gone to college I'd probably be making six figures right now... but I just don't want to be part of that corporate rat race, you know?
Well, and I guess I just feel more comfortable hidden behind the computer than dealing with people face-to-face.
Well, I should get back to work... I need to get this module finished by tomorrow.
Ask him why he doesn't want to see his friends.
Sam charges ahead and strikes down Xarth, freeing the Solarion Staff from his clutches and restoring peace and order to the world.
Healer, huh? That's a very important role.
I guess I'll pick the wizard, then.
Thanks, .
*sigh*... I like having friends, I just need a lot of time alone to balance out the social stuff.
Sam's the opposite... he goes crazy if he's alone for too long.
Maybe that's why I like computers so much... They're engaging, straightforward, and unselfish. Quite the opposite of a lot of people I know.
Let's begin...

The King has entrusted you and your companions with recovering the Solarion Staff... a task which, if completed successfully, will ensure your place in the hall of legends as well as a sizable fortune of gold and silver.
After a long month journeying across unforgiving lands, you step out onto a precipice to see your destination looming in the distance.
There, beyond a moonlit plain, lies the Necromancer's Tower... where Dreadlord Xarth usurps the power of the stolen Solarion Staff for his vile purposes.
A skeleton guards the hallway before you. It looks dangerous.
You successfully block the attack. The skeleton stumbles backward, giving you enough time to strike out and slay the foul creature.
You continue down the hallway, taking care not to step on the skeleton's remains.
The tower lies before you.Search for a back entrance. Let's remain hidden.
What do you do?Run away.
The skeleton lunges forward!Raise your shields.
I do freelance work as a programmer.
Good choice. Warrior's probably the easiest for beginners.
Before I met you, I spent most of my time turned away from reality... because I thought I'd never find happiness.
...but you've shown me that the world isn't such a dark place, after all."/faceDirection Sebastian 3/pause 500/speak Sebastian "...That's one of the reasons I love you..."
Hey, . I'm just catching up with Sam. Go ahead and have some fun.
It's kinda hectic today... I'm just gonna hang out here for a while.
That lady in the graveyard predicted our future...Apparently, we're destined to live a happy life together.
That lady told me my fortune. I don't know what to make of it...
It would be interesting to have one of these on the farm.
I have no idea how these skeletons are walking... creepy.It's pretty cool though.
Hey, could you... give me a hand? Hehehe...These gravestones would look nice on the farm, don't you think?
This is my spot.
I'll be rooting for you in the egg hunt.
We used to do a rotten egg toss...Mayor Lewis put an end to that pretty quick.
You know what? I kind of miss the winter... it's simpler, in a way.
Ugh...
You're the only reason I came all the way out here...
I didn't come here by choice.
I'm doing my best to stay in a good mood...
One year Sam put a pound of anchovies in the potluck soup.Ever wondered why Sam leads the town in community service hours?
Do you remember when you caught me in this spot on that rainy day?Even though this is my solo spot... I was really glad you came.
Oh, hey. Looking to escape the noise too?
I thought I saw something moving in there... something big, something dark.Just trying to scare you...
I remember the first Moonlight Jellies festival that you came to.You didn't notice, but I was watching you when the jellies came up. You looked beautiful in that blue light...
When you stare into the ocean, there's a chance something down there is looking back at you...
Hey, . As you can see, I'm fulfilling my family obligations...
Spending time with family is tiring sometimes.
Hey... don't worry, you don't need to get me anything.I'm just happy to wake up next to you every morning... what else could a guy ask for?
I guess it's nice the whole family is together for once.
Don't worry about me, I never get cold...
Cold? Nah, I never get cold.
Hey, you really need to win the contest today.Uh... well, I guess I made a little bet with Marlon...
You ever notice how quiet it is in the snow?
I really love this. How did you know?
Thanks, I like this.
...I hate this.
...thanks.
